preDeployCommand: python3 manage.py migrate && python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python3 manage.py ensure_admin
deploy.startCommand: bash -lc "python3 manage.py migrate --noinput && python3 manage.py ensure_admin --noinput && python3 -m gunicorn apps.backend.config.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8000}"
